text.div: • Include codes from http://snomed.info/sct where concept is-a 706041008 (Device for body fluid and tissue collection/transfer/processing)

name: SpecimenContainerType
title: Specimen Container Type
description: Checks on the patient prior specimen collection. All SNOMED CT concepts descendants of 706041008 |Device for body fluid and tissue collection/transfer/processing (physical object)|
